Name: Sefir: Mafia Story
About the game: STORY 'Sefir: Mafia Story', set in 2003-2004 an alternative version of Istanbul. Istanbul, Turkey run by a council of Barons. Even a bird cannot fly in the country without the permission of the council. Our story takes place in the period when mobs ruled the streets of Istanbul under the reign of the council. Sefir title is elected by the council and convicted of ensuring order and the balance of power in Istanbul. Our main characters Çakır and Polat are trapped between violent mafia showdowns. The aim of this partnership, who are connected like brothers, is to be Sefir and to rule Istanbul. In this city, where you have to be strong to kill, to kill to live, will Çakır be the strongest? GAMEPLAY Sefir: Mafia Story will impress you with its fierce and challenging gameplay, where every hit is deadly. It offers game mechanics where reflexes and quick thinking come to the fore. The visual style and chain of events will take you to a completely different universe. In Sefir: Mafia Story we control 2 characters. These 2 characters have their own special ability and gameplay.
